tgt_original: 佛告無盡意菩薩： 「若有無量百千萬億眾生受諸苦惱，聞是觀世音菩薩，一心稱名，觀世音菩薩即時觀其音聲，皆得解脫。 」釋曰：

src_original: ye ca kulaputra sattvā avalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya nāmadheyaṃ dhārayiṣyanti,  sacette mahatyagniskandhe prapateyuḥ,  sarve te avalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya tejasā tasmānmahato 'gniskandhāt parimucyeran /
tgt_original: 「初一語業，稱名除七災」者，經云「若有持是觀世音菩薩名者，設入大火，火不能燒。

src_original: sacet punaḥ kulaputra sattvā nadībhiruhyamānā avalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyākrandaṃ kuryuḥ,  sarvāstā nadyasteṣāṃ sattvānāṃ gādhaṃ dadyuḥ /
tgt_original: 由是菩薩威神力故其一。 若為大水所漂，稱其名號，即得淺處其二。

src_original: sacet punaḥ kulaputra sāgaramadhye vahanābhirūḍhānāṃ sattvakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇāṃ  hiraṇyasuvarṇamaṇimuktāvajravaiḍūryaśaṅkhaśilāpravālāśmagarbhamusāragalvalohitamuktādīnāṃ  tasmiṃśca kaścidevaikaḥ sattvaḥ syāt yo 'valokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyākrandaṃ kuryāt,  sarve te parimucyeraṃstasmād rākṣasīdvīpāt /
tgt_original: 若有百千萬億眾生，為求金銀瑠璃硨磲碼碯珊瑚琥珀真珠等寶入於大海，假使黑風吹其船舫漂墮羅剎鬼國，其中若有乃至一人稱觀世音菩薩名者，是諸人等皆得解脫羅剎之難。

src_original: anena khalu punaḥ kulaputra kāraṇena avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'valokiteśvara iti saṃjñāyate //
tgt_original: 以是因緣名觀世音其三。
